title: Rent My Time
description: Developed a peer-to-peer service marketplace with real-time matching algorithm. Challenges included building a secure payment system and implementing geolocation-based search. Resulted in 1500+ active users and 85% successful transaction rate within first 6 months.

title: BoostFC
description: Built gaming e-commerce platform handling $250k+ in transactions. Integrated Stripe and cryptocurrency payments while maintaining PCI compliance. Features include real-time order tracking and automated service delivery system, resulting in 40% repeat customer rate.

title: MessageTTF
description: Created time-capsule messaging system with Twilio integration. Solved challenge of scheduled message delivery with 99.9% reliability. Implemented end-to-end encryption for user data, achieving 4.8/5 user satisfaction rating from 500+ active users.

title: Club Chaser
description: Developed event discovery platform with Google Maps integration and AWS-powered image storage. Reduced map load times by 60% through spatial indexing optimization. Processed 1M+ monthly API requests with 99.95% uptime.

title: Warehouse Stock Check
description: Designed inventory management system reducing stock discrepancies by 45%. Implemented real-time sync across multiple warehouses using WebSocket connections. Features include barcode scanning integration and automated reorder alerts.

title: Point of Sale
description: Developed performant POS system handling 500+ simultaneous transactions. Optimized React rendering by 40% using memoization. Integrated with hardware peripherals through WebUSB API, supporting 1500+ retail installations.
